title: We Go Out to Eat
description: Have you ever thought about all the different steps involved when you go out to eat a meal? We Go Out to Eat provides students a detailed view of a family's trip to a restaurant for breakfast. The book uses detailed photographs, high-frequency words, and repetitive sentence patterns to support readers. The book can also be used to teach students how to determine the sequence of events and how to identify and use verbs.
